casebody.data:
EXETER TOWNSHIP, Respondent
v.
PENNSYLVANIA LABOR RELATIONS BOARD, Petitioner Exeter Township
v.
Pennsylvania Labor Relations Board Petition of: Teamsters Local 429, Intervenor No. 92 MAL 2018
No. 96 MAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. September 5, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 5 th day of September, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED, LIMITED TO the issue set forth below. Allocatur is DENIED as to all remaining issues. The issue rephrased for clarity, is:

(1) Does Section 614 of the Municipalities Planning Code, 53 P.S. § 10614, provide sufficient basis to determine that a zoning officer is a management level employee absent evidence regarding actual job duties?
